segments.text: I'm looking at the woman by the sink; she's still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is absolutely pouring over the front of the sink now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged in a rapidly expanding puddle, yet no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she's in a trance, hypnotized by the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't looked down or heard the water running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she notice the wetness on her dress from the splashing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence is really starting to make me feel quite angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking a fall right behind her, taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea what mischief is happening just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such preventable problems escalating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap her out of her deep concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a recipe for disaster and I dislike it.
segments.speaker: PAR
